hadiths.text: Anas b. malik reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:I came. And in the narration transmitted on the authority of Haddib (the words are): I happened to pass by Moses on the occasion of the Night journey near the red mound (and found him) saying his prayer in his grave

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ مُوسَى صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of Musa, Peace Be Upon Him
